iOS Development Toolbox

An Aggregation of Awesome Stuff

Software Tools

XCode - The main hub for development.
Sourcetree - GUI for Git
Jira- Powerful project management platform
Trello - Simple, lightweight solution for project management
Sketch - Digital design application
Figma - Web-based digital design tool that features collaboration
Slack - Flexible communication platform
Realm Browser - Application for viewing your Realm databases Oh My Zsh - Framework for managing zsh configuration Sublime Text - Text editor

Services

Realm - Mobile database and alternative to Core Data for data persistence
Firebase - Service provided by Google that features a realtime database, cloud storage, analytics, and more

Courses/Guides

Apple’s Swift Guide
Apple’s App Development With Swift iBook
Stanford’s Developing iOS 10 Apps with Swift
iOS Programming: The Big Nerd Ranch Guide

Blogs/Podcasts

Awesome Swift
little bites of cocoa
